headline: Compared to Estimates, Halliburton (HAL) Q3 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics

headline: Core Laboratories Q3 Earnings Surpass Estimates, Decline Y/Y

headline: PTEN Q3 Earnings Loss Narrower Than Expected, Sales Beat
summary: Patterson-UTI Energy expects $85 million in adjusted gross profit from Completion Services and a rig count similar to that of the third quarter in Drilling Services for the fourth quarter.
